Christmas Day lunch at Salvation Army off cards in Whangārei due to volunteer burnout https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/christmas-day-lunch-at-salvation-army-off-cards-in-whangarei-due-to-volunteer-burnout/75A25PKVYVAVXJ6EKOJ5HMFULQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/christmas-day-lunch-at-salvation-army-off-cards-in-whangarei-due-to-volunteer-burnout/75A25PKVYVAVXJ6EKOJ5HMFULQ/ Denise PiperIt's heart-breaking says the Salvation Army Wed, 06 Dec 2023 22:00:00 +0000 In 2020, Trevor McLean and his team at Whangārei Salvation Army packed 500 food parcels a week. Now the volunteers are too tuckered out to help with the organisation's Christmas Day feast, he says. Photo / John Stone
